data.name: Masters of Puzzle - The Goblin Watermill
data.detailed_description:
For your enjoyment, we present The Goblin Watermill - another beautiful artwork from the Polish illustrator Elwira Pawlikowska. This illustration is part of our Steampunk Visions collection by that author, so make sure to check out the rest of the puzzle boxes in it.

Content Details

Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The UHD image captures the original illustration in great detail and you will be able to observe even the finest of details exactly as the artist has painted them on the canvas. The puzzle is of medium to high difficulty, therefore it will provide you with a satisfactory challenge even if you're an expert in assembling this type of images. There are distinct elements to give you the foundation here, but there are also few uniform areas and similar-looking details that might get harder to sort out. In overall, the image has a lot of great and very detailed elements in it to make it very fun and rewarding to reconstruct.

data.short_description: A traditional art puzzle box for the Masters of Puzzle game.
data.supported_languages: English, Bulgarian, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 132 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 132 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change
